gameDetails.name: Wazabi: Dice Tower 2017 Promo Pack
gameDetails.description:
6 card promo set given out from the 2017 Dice Tower Indiegogo campaign. Includes 2 copies each of 3 different cards :

Yes But...No! - Cancel the effect of a card played by another player of your choice. This card may be played at any time, does not count as your one card per turn & does not require a Wasabi symbol to play.

Call Me Master! - Play this card in front of you, it will stay in front of you until the start of your next turn, then it is discarded. Before rolling dice, all other players must honor you as the Wazubi master. Any player who does not receives one penalty die from the box (if available) and shame upon their clan.

Take That! - Take 2 dice back from the box (if available) and give them to the player of your choice.
